products.name: The Lieutenant Standard Box Lunch
products.description: Each box includes a sub with your choice of meat, provolone, condiments, chips, a pickle, and a cookie. Add drinks, and you're all set. Please order for a minimum of 10 people.

products.name: Deluxe Sub Platter Pack (Serves 10 people)
products.description: Assorted 3" sub pieces with our most popular combinations, including ham, turkey, & provolone, roast beef, turkey, & provolone, and ham, Genoa salami, pepperoni, & provolone. Subs come dressed with lettuce, tomatoes, onions, and vinaigrette. Served with mayo, mustard, pickles, potato chips, cookies, and your choice of beverage. Plates and napkins are included. You're all set.

products.name: Deluxe Sub Platter (Serves 10 people)
products.description: Assorted 6" subs with our most popular combinations, including ham, turkey, & provolone, roast beef, turkey, & provolone, and ham, Genoa salami, pepperoni, & provolone. Subs come dressed with lettuce, tomatoes, onions, and vinaigrette, and are served with mayo, mustard, and pickles on the side. Add drinks, and perhaps salad and/or dessert, and you're all set.

products.name: Sub Platter Pack (Serves 10 people)
products.description: Subs with your choice of meats, provolone, lettuce, tomatoes, onions, and vinaigrette. Served with mayo, mustard, pickles, potato chips, cookies, and your choice of beverage. Plates and napkins are included. You're all set.

products.name: Half-Platter - Subs & Salad (Serves 5 people)
products.description: 3" sub pieces with your choice of meat, provolone, lettuce, tomatoes, onions, and vinaigrette. Served with pickles, a salad (with lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, peppers, onions), salad dressing, and a gallon of iced tea. Consider adding dessert; otherwise, you're all set.

products.name: Sub Platter (Serves 10 people)
products.description: 6" subs with your choice of meat, provolone, lettuce, tomatoes, onions, and vinaigrette. Served with mayo, mustard, and pickles. Add drinks, and perhaps salad and/or dessert, and you're all set.

products.name: The Rookie Standard Box Lunch
products.description: Each box includes a sub with your choice of meat, condiments, chips, and a pickle. Add drinks and perhaps dessert, and you're all set. Please order for a minimum of 10 people.

products.name: Half-Platter - Subs & Snack (Serves 5 people)
products.description: 3" sub pieces with your choice of meat, provolone, lettuce, tomatoes, onions, and vinaigrette. Served with pickles, 5 bags of chips, 5 cookies, and a gallon of iced tea. You're all set!

products.name: Salad Platter - Vegetarian (Serves 10)
products.description: Romaine with cucumbers, tomatoes, green bell peppers, and red onions. Served with your choice of dressing on the side. You can usually order side salad for just a third of your headcount.

products.name: Deluxe Salad Platter (Serves 10 people)
products.description: Romaine with provolone, your choice of meat, cucumbers, tomatoes, green bell peppers, and red onions. Served with your choice of dressing on the side. As an entree salad, add drinks and perhaps dessert, and you're all set. As a side salad, you can usually order for a third of your headcount.

products.name: Dessert Combo Platter (24 pieces, serves 20 people)
